name: Debt Watchers
description:
WASD/Arrow Keys or even a controller to move

Mouse click or the A button to attack

There is a lot more we would've liked to add but I am not that  proficient in coding so it took me a while but I tried my best to get the core gameplay in.

For those who would like some story your deadbeat dad passed away and passed his problems to you, so his Boss (sadly not in the game he was really cool) sends you to collect the debt of people who wronged him, so you go around different mazes trying to find the debty before the time limit runs out.

Hope you enjoy and I guess time yourself and post below how fast you beat the game.

I would love to update the game more to implement the story more maps and cutscenes and make it overall juicier

This is the first ever game that me and my girlfriend have made together we plan on making a bigger game in the future but wanted to start with something small so we decided to do a Game Jam
